articles.author: Jennifer De Pinto, Anthony Salvanto, Fred Backus, Kabir Khanna
articles.title: Biden's presidency viewed negatively by most Americans — CBS News poll - CBS News
articles.description: President Biden's approval declined after the U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan and fell even further amid the nation's inflation woes.
articles.content:
President Joe Biden will leave office with ratings far more negative than when he started, and a retrospective approval rating lower than any he received during the term. 
When Americans look back n… [+2541 chars]
